attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
due to the amount of puppy farms and byb's that seem to get away with throw away attitude when it comes to dogs and other animals i feel that the excuse that the rspca have no powers to stop these cruel actions has to stop!they need full police powers!
if the rspca were given the power to act as soon as they could, animal suffering could be intervened sooner rather than later and could stop many animals suffering and future animals, it may make people think twice if there was consequences for there actions!it may also alleviate the large numbers of pups for sale therefore lower the number of dogs being killed because rescues cannot cope with the demand for dogs without homes

rejection.details: Please rewrite your title. For example, it could read: Give the SPCA the power to stop cruelty to animals.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
